name: I Hate Meatballs
description:
This is a simple game made for the Vetelino's Summer Jam.

Choose how much time you want on the clock, and then avoid the meatballs and ice cream to survive.

Controls:

AD - Move

Space - Jump

Music Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrcrxjdkmqFDNzLNG1mvbIw
